verbs.description: GENEVA ( AP ) - [ARG0: The U.N. chief] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: he is " deeply concerned " by the cancellation of the planned summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .

GENEVA ( AP ) - The U.N. chief said Thursday [ARG1: he] [V: is] [ARG2: " deeply concerned " by the cancellation of the planned summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] .
GENEVA ( AP ) - The U.N. chief said Thursday he is " deeply concerned " by the cancellation of the [V: planned] [ARG1: summit] between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un .
